name: R city
description: R CITY is one of the largest retail malls in Mumbai which is strategically located in the central suburb of Mumbai-Ghatkopar on LBS road.
location: LBS Rd, Amrut Nagar, Ghatkopar West, Mumbai, 400086
additionalDetails: Catering to Food, Fashion, and Entertainment, it features 500+ premium brands like Lifestyle, H&M, Super Dry, and a luxury 9-screen INOX multiplex. With 14 Anchor stores, 10+ mini-anchors, 220+ stores, 65+ F&B outlets, and 12+ family entertainment brands.

categories.name: Restaurant
categories.description: Savor exquisite flavors at R City Mall's diverse restaurants, offering a culinary journey that caters to every palate.

subCategories.name: Fast food
subCategories.description: Indulge in quick and delicious bites at R City Mall's fast-food joints, offering a tempting array of flavors for those on the go.
subCategories.additionalDetails: From iconic classics to trendy treats, satisfy your cravings with a speedy and satisfying dining experience.

categories.additionalDetails: From fine dining to casual eats, enjoy a delightful gastronomic experience amidst the vibrant ambiance of the mall.

shops.name: Urban tadka
shops.description: Cuisine: North Indian, Mughlai, Kebab, Biryani, Beverages, Finger Food
shops.additionalDetails: Cost For Two: 1100

shops.name: Bodhi luxury spa
shops.description: This luxury treatment is for those in search of complete relaxation.
shops.additionalDetails: An ultimate bliss of two therapists in attendance taking care of you from head to toe.

shops.name: Decathlon
shops.description: Decathlon is a global sports retailer known for offering a wide range of affordable and quality sporting goods, equipment, and apparel across various sports and outdoor activities.
shops.additionalDetails: With a commitment to sustainability, Decathlon focuses on eco-friendly practices in product development and aims to make sports accessible to everyone.

coupons.name: Save 25%
coupons.additionalDetails: Visit our shop and get flat 25% off on our winter collection.

shops.name: Delsey paris
shops.description: Buy Iconic Travel Luggage, Bags and Accessories online.
shops.additionalDetails: The primary material is water-repellent and features our classic DELSEY Paris logo.

coupons.name: Free coffee
coupons.additionalDetails: Visit any cafe and get 10% off on coffee.

shops.name: Fun o factory
shops.description: The main attraction of FOF is its trampoline park. A large expanse of multiple trampolines connected to one another with bounce walls, basketball rings and balls, is simply too inviting.
shops.additionalDetails: kid choosing to spend time in this area cant help but bounce around and try to basket a ball. This is evident in the guffaws that kids let out when they throw themselves on the trampoline wall to bounce back and then, bounce some more.

shops.name: Indian terrain
shops.description: Indian Terrain is India's leading brand for Men's and Boys clothing.
shops.additionalDetails: The Company is engaged in offering the men's smart casual category, selling under the brand Indian Terrain.

shops.name: Jockey
shops.description: JOCKEY is a registered trademark in over 120 countries. Founded in 1876, Jockey has a long history of manufacturing high quality innovative products beginning with the making and selling of superior wool socks to lumberjacks.
shops.additionalDetails: Jockey is a globally responsible designer and marketer of men's and women's apparel under the world famous Jockey brand and related brands like Skimmies, No Panty Line Promise, JKY, and Life. We hold the number one market share in underwear and intimates in department stores.

shops.name: Lenskart
shops.description: Lenskart is an Indian eyewear retailer offering a diverse range of eyeglasses, sunglasses, and contact lenses. It operates both online and has physical stores across various cities in India.
shops.additionalDetails: Known for its extensive collection, Lenskart provides services like eye check-ups at some of its brick-and-mortar locations. For the latest information, it is advisable to check the official Lenskart website or contact their customer support.

shops.name: American tourister
shops.description: American Tourister Is a Trusted Global Brand Offering High-Quality Travel Products.
shops.additionalDetails: Find luggage, bags and premium travel accessories designed to elevate the joy of travel.

shops.name: Bose
shops.description: Experience the latest in sound innovation. Shop Bose headphones, earbuds, speakers, and soundbars, supported by premium customer service. Sound is Power.
shops.additionalDetails: Bose Corporation is an American manufacturing company that predominantly sells audio equipment.

shops.name: Jbl studio
shops.description: It is an American audio electronics company. It is named after its founder, James Bullough Lansing.
shops.additionalDetails: It is one of most reputed brands in the audio industry. Its primary products are loudspeakers and related electronics.

shops.name: Celio
shops.description: Made in wool and cotton, this polo neck sweater is super comfortable and warm to beat the chills in style.
shops.additionalDetails: Shop Men's Clothing online. Explore the premium collection of men's wear, shirt, pants, and jeans, in different fits and colours at Celio.

shops.name: Kompanero
shops.description: Shop for Kompanero Handbags, Wallets, Duffel bags, Laptop Bags & more in various sizes.
shops.additionalDetails: Kompanero Is a Selection of Leather Products with a Range of Natural Leather.

coupons.name: Save 12%
coupons.description: Save 12% off on our INOX insignia
coupons.additionalDetails: Visit any Matanee show and get 12% off.

shops.name: Adams stores
shops.description: Adams Stores at R City Mall offers a variety of retail products and services, providing a convenient shopping experience in a popular mall setting.
shops.additionalDetails: Explore Adams Stores at R City Mall for a diverse range of fashion and lifestyle products, catering to the diverse needs of shoppers in a vibrant shopping environment.

shops.name: Afton treadmill & gym equipment store
shops.description: Founded as a startup in 1988 Afton Fitness is today one of India's largest and fastest growing fitness equipment supply and service companies.
shops.additionalDetails: Gym Bench for Home Afton is a manufacturer and supplier of gym bench for home and gym use. Check out our range of Gym kits for homes.

shops.name: Aeropostale
shops.description: Aeropostale Inc., is an American shopping mall based retailer of casual apparel and accessories, principally aimed at young adults and teenagers.
shops.additionalDetails: Aropostale maintains control over its proprietary brands by designing, sourcing, marketing, and selling all of its own merchandise.

shops.name: Agent jack's bar
shops.description: A theme bar where customers can interact with a virtual bartender.
shops.additionalDetails: Customers use an app to negotiate for their drinks at their own choice of prices with Agent Jack, the virtual bartender.

coupons.name: Save 25%
coupons.additionalDetails: Visit our shop and get flat 25% off on our winter collection.

shops.name: Baggit
shops.description: Baggit is an online platform that offers branded handbags, wallets, purses and accessories for women.
shops.additionalDetails: Baggit as a brand has been using synthetic leather-like PVC, unlike PU which most of the brands use. PVC has inherently sustainable characteristics and is easily recyclable.

shops.name: H&m
shops.description: H&M is your shopping destination for fashion, home, beauty, kids' clothes and more.
shops.additionalDetails: H & M Hennes & Mauritz AB, also known as H&M Group, is a multinational clothing company based in Sweden that focuses on fast-fashion clothing.

shops.name: Charles & keith
shops.description: Charles & Keith is a Singaporean fashion house label founded in 1996, specializing in footwear, handbags and fashion accessories.
shops.additionalDetails: Based in Singapore, the brand has a global footprint, operating more than 600 stores worldwide across 37 countries.

shops.name: Inc.5
shops.description: Inc5 Timeless Collection Elevate your look with Inc5 Shoes.
shops.additionalDetails: Shop the finest collection this festive season. Elevate Your Style with Inc5 Timeless Footwear for Men & Women.

categories.name: Kidzania
categories.additionalDetails: KidZania in R City Mall, Ghatkopar, Mumbai, is an interactive educational entertainment center where children can engage in role-playing activities to learn about various professions in a mini-city setting.

coupons.name: Games & more
coupons.description: 10 Video Games + 10 Ticket Games + 3 Prize Games + 1 Attraction activity
coupons.additionalDetails:
Open the voucher on your phone - via email or under the 'purchases' section of the app
Show the voucher to the merchant when you visit
The merchant will verify the voucher and redeem it on your app
30 days of purchase

parkings.additionalDetails: R City mall is quite big. It has 2 parking areas, one is underground & other is above. Either of one is open at one time.

events.name: Christmas
events.description: Experience the enchantment of Christmas at R City Mall, Ghatkopar, where festive cheer comes alive with dazzling decorations, joyful carols, and a magical atmosphere that welcomes families to create lasting holiday memories.
events.additionalDetails: Celebrate the magic of Christmas at R City Mall, Ghatkopar, where festive decorations, joyful carols, and a warm, enchanting atmosphere create a magical holiday experience for shoppers and families. Indulge in the spirit of giving and discover delightful surprises around every corner as the mall transforms into a winter wonderland during this joyous season.

otherAttractions.name: Christmas
otherAttractions.description: Experience the enchantment of Christmas at R City Mall, Ghatkopar, where festive cheer comes alive with dazzling decorations, joyful carols, and a magical atmosphere that welcomes families to create lasting holiday memories.
